overview: Nobody ever thought about what our shoes do while we sleep? Perhaps, while we indulge in the sweet enjoyment of sleep, our shoes, sneakers, shoes, slippers, felt boots and other types of shoes do not sleep, but travel? Animation film "Shoes" will show how can frolic shoes at night, traveling to different places. Now the boy is fast asleep in his bed, because during the day he had a lot of worries, which children usually indulge in in the summertime. Leaving a pair of his shoes near the bed, he had no idea that at night they could go somewhere without him. However, that's what happened.
title: Shoes
